name: Endless Bundle
description:
All the games included in this bundle are part of the same fictional universe known as the Endless Universe. These games are developed by Amplitude Studios, and they share a common science fiction setting with interconnected lore and themes.
Endless™ Bundle includes:
Dungeon of the ENDLESS™ - Definitive Edition - Disintegrated ship. Merry band of misfits for a team. Survive in the Endless Dungeon. Combining roguelike, tower defense, and dungeon-crawling elements.


ENDLESS™ Space - Definitive Edition - Explore star systems, colonize planets, engage in diplomacy, and manage your interstellar empire in a traditional 4X gameplay format. Guide one of twelve civilizations as you strive for galactic domination.


ENDLESS™ Space 2 Definitive Edition - Continue the saga in the sequel to ENDLESS™ Space, where the 4X genre evolves with new factions, improved graphics, and additional features.


System requirements and features may vary between games - please check individual product pages for details.
